title: Dennis the menace
creator_credit: Nick Castle, Richard Vane, John Hughes and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Where Dennis goes, mayhem follows and somehow, most of it seems to land in the lap of his long-suffering next-door neighbour, Mr. Wilson. Cast includes Walter Matthau, Christopher Lloyd, Joan Plowright, Lea Thompson and Mason Gamble as Dennis. Based on Hank Ketcham’s cartoon, Dennis the Menace.
